summary:
Tired of all those old, beat up looking male followers in Skyrim? 
Wishing you had some nice eyecandy to stare at while you are out on your
adventures? Looking for that \"Knight in Shining Armor\"?? Then look no 
further, this is the mod you have been looking for!

[line] 
[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]
========================================================



Tired of all those old, beat up looking male followers in Skyrim?  Wishing you had some nice 
eyecandy to stare at while you are out on your adventures?  Looking for that \"Knight in 
Shining Armor\"?? Then look no further, this is the mod you have been looking for! [/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]

========================================================



This mod places a unique follower named Eric, a Necromancer, into Jorrvaskr, in Whiterun. He uses light armor, staves, and has 

all the light armor, conjuration, and Illusion perks. He has a lot of good spells at all levels so he should be quite useful in 

just about any situation. He is also set to not effect stealth meter so you can basically take him anywhere and he wont give you 

away while sneaking. He is hireable and marriageable and should be compatible with multiple follower mods, such as UFO, 

Followers Can Relax, etc. 



Please let me know if you have any problems with installing or using this mod.



This Project is a continual work in progress, I will be adding more companions, I hope to 
eventually make them standalone mods, and to combine all the followers into one mod at some 
point.  I also hope to possibly create some unique armors and textures in the future as my 
skill with modding increases.[/center] 

[line]


[line] 

Future Compaions - works in progress
============================
[color=\"#ff8c00\"][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25005]A Battlemage[/url][/color] -DONE!
[color=\"#ff8c00\"][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24816]Sword and Shield Warrior[/url][/color] - DONE!
[color=\"#ff8c00\"][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25305]A 2h Beserker[/url][/color] - DONE!
[color=\"#ff8c00\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25428]A Ranger [/url][/color] - DONE!
[color=\"#ff8c00\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25694]An Assassin[/url][/color] - DONE!
A Spellsword - will be released in the standalone versio
A Necromancer - DONE!
A Dualwielding Weaponmaster - will be released in the standalone version

[line]

[center]
If you want your follower to look exactly like the screenshots you will need to DL:

[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii Sky Hair - by Apachii[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Chris57 - Better Males - Beautiful Nudes and Faces[/url][/color] 
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23029]The Goddess ENB[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21620]HQ Beards - vanilla texture replacers by Regn[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9645]Black Mage Armor[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11777]Triss Merigold Staff[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by Urshi[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15494/]Dread Knight Weapon Set by jojjo[/url][/color]
[color=\"#00BFFF\"][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty by LogRaam [/url][/color]
- For the new eye texture replacement (which is taking the place of Improved Eyes Skyrim)

If I have forgotten to give credit to anyone, please pm me and let me know 
and I will add you to the list.
[/center]

[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Location[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]Jorrvaskr in Whiterun Hold[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]History[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

History

============

v3: Replaced his old eye texture from Improved Eyes Skyrim mod, with a new
one from The Eyes of Beauty. Added a melee weapon for close combat fighting.
v2: Updated his Black Mage Armor to the current 3.0 version
Also tweaked his hair and skin colors a bit and narrowed his face a bit, 
he was looking A little fat in the face, so I slimmed it down a bit.
v1: ...initial release

 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Upgrade[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]How to Upgrade Safely

=================



1.  Load game ==> Fire all followers ==>Save ==>Quit game



2.  Uncheck Eric.esp and Eric.bsa from NMM and/or from game launcher ==>Load the save from 
step 1 ==>Save again ==>Quit



3.  Delete Eric.esp and Eric.bsa From Skyrim/Data



4.  Copy and paste the new version of Eric.esp and Eric.bsa to Skyrim/Data folder ==> Load 
Game ==> Play![/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Known Issues and Bugs[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]UFO ( And most like all multi follower mods -- thought I\'ve only tested with UFO)

       - Can\'t hire more than one follower at a time.

             ---This occurs because NPC Editor can\'t set currentfollowerfaction to -1 (As it 
doesn\'t allow setting negative numbers)[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Incompatibilities[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]No Known Incompatibilities[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Contact[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]Please send a PM to me (NWelf) on the Nexus Forums if you have any questions, 
concerns, or problems with the mod[/center] 

[line]

Regn - HQ Beards - Vanilla texture replacers (light version + light eyebrows + more eyebrows 
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21620)

The Goddess ENB - (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23029)


Bandolier - Bags and Pouches by Dragten - (http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438)

Dread Knight Weapon Set by jojjo - http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15494/



If I have forgotten to give credit to anyone, please pm me and let me know 

and I will add you to the list.[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]

===========================================================

For manual install:  Drag and drop the Data folder to your Skyrim folder in (Program Files
(x86)/Steam/Steam apps/common/SKYRIM)

   **Be sure to place this mod AFTER any multi-follower mods in your

      Load order, such as UFO, Horses For Followers, Followers Can Relax,

      etc.
[/center]

[line]


[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Nexus Mod Manager Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]For NMM: Download and install through NMM[/center] 

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]Please follow the Safe Upgrade Instructions listed elsewhere in this readme.  But 
just stop after the delete Eric.esp and Eric.bsa .  Then just load game and make a new save.
[/center] 

[line]

just stop after the delete Eric.esp and Eric.bsa .  Then just load game and make a new save.
[/center] 

[line]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Frequently Asked Questions[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[b][color=#42a945]1. What face-body-textures have I used in the screenshots?...[/color][/b] 

[b][color=Black]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b] 

  Face: Younger Faces Merged with Men By Geonox - (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488)

  Face: HQ Beards - Vanilla texture replacers by Regn - (http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/
mods/21620)

  Body: Better Males - Beautiful Nudes and Faces- Sundracon Body (http://
skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

  Face:  Fine Face Textures by Urshi - http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/

  Body:  Smooth Male Body - textures for Better Males - SOS Schlongs of Skyrim - http://
skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145

[b][color=#42a945]2.  I have those face mods listed above but my characters still not look as 
in your screenshots, why? ...[/color][/b] 

[b][color=Black]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b] 

To make my characters and their hair look as good as possible I use an ENB mod by Anaphiel.

  The Goddess ENB (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23029) 

[b][color=#42a945]3. Why do I have duplicates of the hair this mod uses in the 
showracemenu?? ...[/color][/b] 

[b][color=Black]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b] 

This mod was made with the NPC Editor, so the apachii mod makes a duplicate of the hair used

  for this mod in the showracemenu.

[b][color=#42a945]4.  The mod isn\'t working, I can\'t find follower in Jorrvaskr, how do I fix 
this?...[/color][/b] 

[b][color=Black]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b] 

- Make sure you installed the mod correctly - See Install instructions

  - Make sure you checked Eric.esp in the game launcher under data files.

  - Make sure you don\'t have any other that might conflict with this one.

 *For example another follower mod that places the follower at Jorrvaskr.

[b][color=#42a945]5.  Why can\'t I activate your esp file in the Skyrim launcher, the Data files 
option is greyed out?...[/color][/b] 

[b][color=Black]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b] 

If you can\'t select files in the launcher go to - Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

 - Open SkyrimPrefs.ini

 - In the text look for

      [Launcher]

      bEnableFileSelection=1 (if this is 0 change it to 1)

[b][color=#42a945]6. The follower is naked when I go to hire him at Jorrvaskr, how do I fix 
this? [/color][/b] 

[b][color=Black]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b] 

 This is a problem with the NPC Editor, when a default outfit is not chosen.  To fix it,

  just hire him as usual, then ask to trade something, hand him anything, armor, weapon, 
potion,

  and he will auto dress, with the armor and weapons that I have placed in his inventory. 

  (had to do it this way cause for some unknown reason when I set a default outfit, when I 
try 

  to hire him ingame, I cant talk to him at all, not sure why).  I will be working on this 
and 

  hope to have it fixed in the near future.



  Or if you are using UFO you can tell him to dress better, or use the \"you are naked\" 
dialogue 

  to get him to dress using the armor and weapons he has in his inventory.



[b][color=#42a945]7. Help, I can\'t find Improved Eyes Skyrim anywhere on Nexus ...[/color][/b] 

[b][color=Black]-------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b] 

Improved Eyes Skyrim is no longer available on the Nexus.  Rest assured version 3 of the 
Eric mod uses a new eye texture replacement mod, called The Eyes Of Beauty, and is no longer 
dependent on Improved Eyes Skyrim.

[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=#42a945]Legal and Licensing[/color][/size][/center][/u] 

[center]Please ask permission before altering, using my mod in another mod, or reuploading an 
altered version of the mod.  And please give credit to me for the original mod if you do.



Eric is my own creation, but the other mods used in his creation belong to those mod authors 
and you must also obtain their permission as well in regaurds to their content.[/center] 

[line]

[center][size=3][color=#42a945]ReadMe generated with: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/
mods/22340]Pyròs: GuideLines[/url][/color][/size][/center] 

[line]

Special Thanks
 
============================================ 


Special Thanks go to kaix346 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/412061) for all of the awesome 
and helpful advise, and wonderful tutorials, without which I would have been totally lost
and still banging my head on the desk trying to figure out how to make this mod lol!
 
[line]
